ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????
ygData.msgSnippet: Oasis is pretty much open ground theres no claiming of spawns.  You get whatever you can tag and pull.  It s one of the few zones where this is so, because
ygData.messageBody:
Oasis is pretty much open ground theres no claiming of spawns.  You get whatever you can tag and pull.  It's one of the few zones where this is so, because mobs wander and are spread across the zone.  However, if you already pulled them into your camp then it should be hands-off.  Unless of course you ask for assistance.
-----Original Message-----
From: Denis A. Baldwin [mailto:dbaldwin@...]
Sent: Monday, July 23, 2001 8:48 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????

I never started seeing this until I was in the Oasis of Marr yesterday. When hunting DW Crocs, our group was INVADED by 3 or 4 others who would grab every other kill AFTER we pulled them.
 
Denis
 

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
dbaldwin@...

-----Original Message-----
From: Steven Hulse [mailto:kosingigglephitz@...]
Sent: Sunday, July 22, 2001 1:17 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Whats up with kill stealing????

Hi everyone!
  What is up with the kill stealing? I've had it
happen to me several times where I was soloing and
after killing several creatures, (Getting attacked one
right after another), I'll find that while I'm
fighting off an attacker my other kills have been
stolen. Sometimes I'll even see them do it. Granted
I've gone up to some other players kills after a time
mistaking it for one of mine but I mean blatently
going up and stealing a kill right in front of the
original player?

That really sucks!
C-ya!
Steve 
(A.K.A Durgaa, Shizney, Printor, Ahlannah)
